product information:
Featuring the maximum resolution of 1024x768, the Pavilion F1503 monitor is great to play games on or work. Additionally, this HP LCD monitor has TFT screen with an anti-glare surface that does not damage your eyes even if you work for longer time. This HP 15-inch monitor has an Analog VGA interface connector to connect to your computer. Through the onscreen menus, you can adjust the settings of the Pavilion F1503, thanks to its OSD manager. Save on power and energy as this HP 15-inch monitor consumes maximum of 40 watts of power. With the adjustable pedestal of this HP LCD monitor, you can adjust the level and positioning as per your convenience.
